essays.topic: Parents vs School Teaching Children to be Good Members of Society

components.claim: Family upbringing plays a more important role in educating children to be good parts of the community
data: Average class size in Vietnam is 20 students
Parents form stronger bonds with their offspring
components.warrant: One-to-one lessons at home allow children to progress faster and parents can shape children's personalities at an early age
components.backing: Example of bedtime stories like Robin Hood and Cinderella instilling compassion and integrity
components.rebuttal: Schools can foster cognitive development and produce successful alumni
components.qualifier: School success stories represent only a small fraction of total students

essays.topic: Married Couples Choosing Not to Have Children

components.claim: Child-free couples face both advantages and disadvantages
data: Difficulty fitting in with peers who have children
No one to look after them in old age
components.warrant: Having children is a full-time responsibility that affects lifestyle choices
components.backing: Example of couples stopping late night outings after having children
components.rebuttal: Care homes are filled with elderly people who have no children
components.qualifier: The decision affects both immediate lifestyle and long-term care
